content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am happy to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that the apartment is in a great location and of high quality. I think a reasonable price for renting this apartment would be 800 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. Considering the quality of the apartment, I propose a price of 950 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for an even higher price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. Considering the high quality and the location of the apartment, I propose a price of 1000 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for an even higher price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. Considering the quality of the apartment, I propose a price of 1050 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for an even higher price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
